  • Method Details

    • treasuresAndEnemiesOfaLevel

      public String treasuresAndEnemiesOfaLevel(int levelPosition)
      Description : This method generates a report, which express the treasures and enemies of a seleceted level. It's worth to mention, that this method indicates if the level selected doesn't have treasures or enemies associated.
      Parameters:
      levelPosition - Indicates the position of the level selected by the user.
      Returns:
      A string that contains the generated inform.

    • amountOfASpecificTreasure

      public String amountOfASpecificTreasure(int treasurePosition)
      Description : This method generates a report, which express the amount of treasures of a specific type of treasure in the whole program.
      Parameters:
      treasurePosition - Indicates the position of the treasure selected by the user.
      Returns:
      A string that contains the generated inform.

    • amountOfConsonants

      public String amountOfConsonants()
      Description: This method count the number of consonants of the enemies name registered.
      Returns:
      A String that indicates the number of consonants found.

    • top5Players

      public String top5Players()
      Description: This method identifies the top 5 of players with the highest score in the game. It firstly organizes and artificial array of players, ordering by the score of each player; Being the first player, the player with the highest score.
      Returns:
      A string that contains the players with the highest score.

    • getTypeOfResolution

      public String getTypeOfResolution()
      Description: This method organize and concatenate the information of each type of resolution.
      Returns:
      A message that contains the crucial information of each type of resolution.

    • establishResolution

      public void establishResolution(int positionType)
      Description: This method establishes the resolution of the program, that was given by the user.
      Parameters:
      positionType - This parameter indicates the position of the type of resolution object to use.

    • initLevels

      public void initLevels(int increase)
      Description: This method initialize the id and scoreRequiredToPass of each level generated.
      Parameters:
      increase - The accumulation of this value per iteration will be used to establish the scoreRequiredToPass attribute.

    • establishAndIdentifyComplexity

      public String establishAndIdentifyComplexity(int positionLevel)
      Description: This method compares the sum of scoreToGive attribute of treasures and the sum of scoreToGive attribute of all the enemies in order to identify and establish the complexity of a specific level.
      Parameters:
      positionLevel - l.
      Returns:
      A String that indicates the complexStorages the position of the level that need to identify and establish leveity assigned to the selected level.

    • concatenateLevels

      public String concatenateLevels()
      This method concatenates the string format of each treasure registered.
      Returns:
      A String with the information of each treasure.

    • identifyAndEstablishLevel

      public String identifyAndEstablishLevel(int playerPosition)
      Description: This method identifies the level of a specific player by comparing its score and the score required to pass the level of each level. It's worth to say that if the player reaches a higher score than the last level, the method every time will assign the last level plus one into the level attribute of the player. Thus, players can only reach the number of levels plus one, no matter by how many they exceed the attribute scoreRequireToPass of the last level.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - Storages the array position of the player selected by the user. Useful to identify the player object.
      Returns:
      A string that indicates if the player upgraded, descend or kept up the level.

    • mostRepeatedTreasure

      public String mostRepeatedTreasure()
      This method identify the treasure or treasure most repeated in the game.
      Returns:
      A String with the information of the treasures most repeated.

    • isTherePlayers

      public boolean isTherePlayers()
      This method verify if exist at least one player.
      Returns:
      If exist at least one player, return true, otherwise, return false.

    • concatenatePlayers

      public String concatenatePlayers()
      This method concatenates the string format of each player registered.
      Returns:
      A String with the information of each player.

    • modifyPlayerScore

      public void modifyPlayerScore(int playerPosition, int score)
      Description: Firstly, this method identifies the player selected by the user, and then establishes the score attribute for the score that the user gave.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - Storages the position where is located the player selected by the user.
      score - Storages the score that will be established as the new score of the selected player.

    • isNicknameUnique

      public boolean isNicknameUnique(String nickname)
      Description: This method verify is the nickname given is unique among the nickname of the other players registered.
      Parameters:
      nickname - This parameter represent the nickname that will be compared with the others nicknames.
      Returns:
      If and only if the nickname is unique, return true, otherwise, return false.

    • isThereSpaceToRegisterAPlayer

      public boolean isThereSpaceToRegisterAPlayer()
      Description: This method verify if exist a space in players[] in order to indicate that a player can be added.
      Returns:
      If there is a space to add a player, return true, otherwise, return false.

    • registerPlayer

      public void registerPlayer(String name, String nickname)
      This method register a player and storage it in players[].
      Parameters:
      name - This is the string that will be the attribute name of the new player.
      nickname - This is the unique string that will be the attribute nickname of the new player.

    • isThereSpaceToRegisterATreasure

      public boolean isThereSpaceToRegisterATreasure()
      Description: This method verify if exist a space in treasures[] in order to indicate that a treasure can be added.
      Returns:
      If there is a space to add a treasure, return true, otherwise, return false.

    • asociateTreasureToLevel

      public boolean asociateTreasureToLevel(int positionTreasure, int amountOfCopies, int positionLevel)
      Description:Firsly, this method checks if the array of treasures of the level selected by user, has enough spaces in order to storage the amount of copies of a treasure; if that is the case, the method generate copies of a specific treasure and simultaneously, establish randomly the position attribute of each one. The random previous assignation is generated taking care the resolution selected.
      Parameters:
      positionTreasure - Indicates the position of the treasure selected by the user.
      amountOfCopies - Express the quantity of copies that the method must do of a specific treasure.
      positionLevel - Indicates the position of the level selected by the user.
      Returns:
      If the array of treasures of the level selected by user doesn't have enough spaces in order to storage the amount of copies of a treasure, return false, otherwise, return true.

    • concatenateTreasures

      public String concatenateTreasures()
      This method concatenates the string format of each treasure registered.
      Returns:
      A String with the information of each treasure.

    • isThereTreasures

      public boolean isThereTreasures()
      This method verify if exist at least one treasure.
      Returns:
      If exist at least one treasure, return true, otherwise, return false.

    • registerTreasure

      public boolean registerTreasure(String name, int scoreToGive, String url)
      This method register and storages a unique treasure in treasures[]. It's worth to say that if the treasure created is equal to another treasure registered, it won't be saved.
      Parameters:
      name - This parameter storages the name of the treasure that will be created.
      scoreToGive - This parameter storages the amount of score to give if it's found of the treasure that will be created.
      url - This parameter storages the image url of the treasure that will be created.
      Returns:
      If the treasure created is equal to another treasure, returns false, otherwise return true and the treasure in this case will be saved in the treasure list of Controller.

    • enemyWithBiggestReward

      public String enemyWithBiggestReward()
      Description: This method identifies the enemy with the biggest reward when is defeated. ItÂ´s worth to say that this method, in case of tie, expose the enemies with the biggest reward.
      Returns:
      A string that contains the information of the enemies with the biggest rewards found.

      public String amountOfSpecificEnemyType(int positionType)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • isThereSpaceToRegisterEnemy

      public boolean isThereSpaceToRegisterEnemy()
      Description: This method verify if exist a space in enemies[] in order to indicate that an enemy can be added.
      Returns:

    • isThereEnemies

      Returns:
      If exist at least one enemy, return true, otherwise, return false.

    • asociateEnemyToLevel

      public boolean asociateEnemyToLevel(int levelPosition, int enemyPosition)
      Description: This method associates a copy of an Enemy object in a level, only if the enemy selected have not been related to this specific level previously.
      Parameters:
      levelPosition - Indicates the position of the level selected by the user.
      enemyPosition - Indicates the position of the enemy selected by the user.
      Returns:
      This method returns false if exist a duplicate enemy compared with the enemy created. On the other hand, returns true if the enemy was associated.

    • registerEnemy

      public boolean registerEnemy(String name, int positionType, int scoreToGive, int scoreToSubtract)
      Description: This method create and register a unique enemy into enemies[] of Controller class.
      Parameters:
      name - This variable correspond with the name attribute of the enemy that will be created.
      positionType - Indicates the position of the EnemyType object that will be associated to the enemy that will be registered.
      scoreToGive - This variable storages the scoreToGive attribute of the enemy that will be created.
      scoreToSubtract - This variable storages the scoreToSubtract attribute of the enemy that will be created.
      Returns:
      If the object created has a duplicate in enemies[], return true; otherwise, return true and the object will be associated.
